org.openqa.selenium.edge

类 EdgeDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver
      • org.openqa.selenium.edge.EdgeDriver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    HasCapabilities, HasInputDevices, FindsByClassName, FindsByCssSelector, FindsById, FindsByLinkText, FindsByName, FindsByTagName, FindsByXPath, JavascriptExecutor, SearchContext, TakesScreenshot, WebDriver

    public class EdgeDriver
extends RemoteWebDriver
    A WebDriver implementation that controls a Edge browser running on the local machine. This class is provided as a convenience for easily testing the Edge browser. The control server which each instance communicates with will live and die with the instance. To avoid unnecessarily restarting the MicrosoftEdgeDriver server with each instance, use a RemoteWebDriver coupled with the desired EdgeDriverService, which is managed separately. For example: 
    

 import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;

 import org.junit.*;
 import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
 import org.junit.runners.JUnit4;
 import org.openqa.selenium.edge.EdgeDriverService;
 import org.openqa.selenium.remote.DesiredCapabilities;
 import org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver;

 {@literal @RunWith(JUnit4.class)}
 public class EdgeTest extends TestCase {

   private static EdgeDriverService service;
   private WebDriver driver;

   {@literal @BeforeClass}
   public static void createAndStartService() {
     service = new EdgeDriverService.Builder()
         .usingDriverExecutable(new File("path/to/my/MicrosoftWebDriver.exe"))
         .usingAnyFreePort()
         .build();
     service.start();
   }

   {@literal @AfterClass}
   public static void createAndStopService() {
     service.stop();
   }

   {@literal @Before}
   public void createDriver() {
     driver = new RemoteWebDriver(service.getUrl(),
         DesiredCapabilities.edge());
   }

   {@literal @After}
   public void quitDriver() {
     driver.quit();
   }

   {@literal @Test}
   public void testGoogleSearch() {
     driver.get("http://www.google.com");
     WebElement searchBox = driver.findElement(By.name("q"));
     searchBox.sendKeys("webdriver");
     searchBox.quit();
     assertEquals("webdriver - Google Search", driver.getTitle());
   }
 }
    另请参阅:
    EdgeDriverService.createDefaultService()

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EdgeDriver

        public EdgeDriver()
        Creates a new EdgeDriver using the default server configuration.
        另请参阅:
        EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService, EdgeOptions)

      • EdgeDriver

        public EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService service)
        Creates a new EdgeDriver instance. The service will be started along with the driver, and shutdown upon calling RemoteWebDriver.quit().
        参数:
        service - The service to use.
        另请参阅:
        EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService, EdgeOptions)

      • EdgeDriver

        public EdgeDriver(Capabilities capabilities)
        Creates a new EdgeDriver instance. The capabilities will be passed to the edgedriver service.
        参数:
        capabilities - The capabilities required from the EdgeDriver.
        另请参阅:
        EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService, Capabilities)

      • EdgeDriver

        public EdgeDriver(EdgeOptions options)
        Creates a new EdgeDriver instance with the specified options.
        参数:
        options - The options to use.
        另请参阅:
        EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService, EdgeOptions)

      • EdgeDriver

        public EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService service,
                  EdgeOptions options)
        Creates a new EdgeDriver instance with the specified options. The service will be started along with the driver, and shutdown upon calling RemoteWebDriver.quit().
        参数:
        service - The service to use.
        options - The options to use.

      • EdgeDriver

        public EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService service,
                  Capabilities capabilities)
        Creates a new EdgeDriver instance. The service will be started along with the driver, and shutdown upon calling RemoteWebDriver.quit().
        参数:
        service - The service to use.
        capabilities - The capabilities required from the EdgeDriver.
